alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lamoille, northern Caledonia, Orleans, northeastern Chittenden and Franklin Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairfield, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport City, Enosburg Falls, Orleans, Derby Center, Charleston, Jay, Newport Town, Jay In Franklin County, Cambridge, Montgomery Center, Albany, Westford, Montgomery, St. Albans City, Fairfax, Troy, Sheldon, Belvidere Center, Brownington Village and Enosburg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 89 between mile markers 109 and 121. Interstate 91 between mile markers 156 and 177. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern and northwestern Vermont.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin
